alert.note: Alert for Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 21 at 4:28AM PDT until April 22 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts over 50 mph possible. Ridgetop winds in the Spring Mountains could eclipse 60 mph at times. * WHERE...Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon and Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 2 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Downslope winds could result in a dangerous crosswind for high profile vehicles across Highway 95 between Indian Springs and Amargosa Valley.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
